title: Residences for labourers and related temporary structures should be constructed at least 500 meters away from the place of blasting as well as from the place of quarrying
clause_text: Residences for labourers and related temporary structures should be constructed at least 500 meters away from the place of blasting as well as from the place of quarrying. Heavy blasting by use of heavy machinery shall be prohibited

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
